title: MMR System for Flex Queue

embed.description: Highlight what Riots plans were with the flex Queue. Keep in mind these are my opinions and speculations with some sources and research.

body:
Keep in mind this is the information I have gathered through my research and my own opinions seeing the relative details.

They maybe heading into a completely different direction to what I say or I maybe spot on.

Hopefully you enjoy.

replies.body: The system is already been broken. I am Bronze yet I keep ending up with Gold And Plat players and I keep getting absolutely spanked. I would rather be playing against and with people of around my skill level. Not get destroyed by people that I shouldn't be in games against
(There is a riot post saying there is an issue with it.)
